af3786ef-5dd8-4b6c-929b-99005b27a784.title: Generation by environment
af3786ef-5dd8-4b6c-929b-99005b27a784.description: This defines total number of request grouped by environment name

config.query:
WITH
    parseDateTimeBestEffort('{{filter.timeLimit.start}}') AS start_time,
    parseDateTimeBestEffort('{{filter.timeLimit.end}}') AS end_time

SELECT 
    ResourceAttributes['deployment.environment'] AS environment,
    CAST(COUNT(*) AS INTEGER) AS count
  FROM
  otel_traces
  WHERE 
  SpanAttributes['gen_ai.operation.name'] == 'vectordb'
  AND notEmpty(ResourceAttributes['deployment.environment'])
  AND StatusCode IN ('STATUS_CODE_OK', 'STATUS_CODE_UNSET', 'Ok', 'Unset')
  AND Timestamp >= start_time
    AND Timestamp <= end_time
  GROUP BY environment;

c7d531ef-3752-45a5-aa24-4b6de0f63be4.title: Generation by system
c7d531ef-3752-45a5-aa24-4b6de0f63be4.description: This defines total number of request grouped by system name

config.query:
WITH
    parseDateTimeBestEffort('{{filter.timeLimit.start}}') AS start_time,
    parseDateTimeBestEffort('{{filter.timeLimit.end}}') AS end_time

SELECT 
    SpanAttributes['db.system.name'] AS system,
    CAST(COUNT(*) AS INTEGER) AS count
  FROM
  otel_traces
  WHERE 
  SpanAttributes['gen_ai.operation.name'] == 'vectordb'
  AND notEmpty(SpanAttributes['db.system.name'])
  AND StatusCode IN ('STATUS_CODE_OK', 'STATUS_CODE_UNSET', 'Ok', 'Unset')
  AND Timestamp >= start_time
    AND Timestamp <= end_time
  GROUP BY system;

2c324137-3795-4268-ab8a-831a2977826c.title: Average Request Duration
2c324137-3795-4268-ab8a-831a2977826c.description: This defines the average request duration for the time period selected

config.query:
WITH
    parseDateTimeBestEffort('{{filter.timeLimit.start}}') AS start_time,
    parseDateTimeBestEffort('{{filter.timeLimit.end}}') AS end_time,
    (end_time - start_time) AS duration,
    (start_time - duration) AS prev_start_time,
    (end_time - duration) AS prev_end_time

SELECT
    round(multiply(
        avgIf(Duration, Timestamp >= start_time AND Timestamp <= end_time),
        10e-10
    ), 4) AS average_duration,

    round(multiply(
        avgIf(Duration, Timestamp >= prev_start_time AND Timestamp <= prev_end_time),
        10e-10
    ), 4) AS average_duration_previous,

    round(
        if(
            avgIf(Duration, Timestamp >= prev_start_time AND Timestamp <= prev_end_time) = 0,
            avgIf(Duration, Timestamp >= start_time AND Timestamp <= end_time) * 100.0,
            (
                avgIf(Duration, Timestamp >= start_time AND Timestamp <= end_time) -
                avgIf(Duration, Timestamp >= prev_start_time AND Timestamp <= prev_end_time)
            ) / avgIf(Duration, Timestamp >= prev_start_time AND Timestamp <= prev_end_time) * 100.0
        ), 4
    ) AS rate
FROM otel_traces
WHERE
    SpanAttributes['gen_ai.operation.name'] == 'vectordb'
    AND isFinite(Duration)
    AND StatusCode IN ('STATUS_CODE_OK', 'STATUS_CODE_UNSET', 'Ok', 'Unset')
    AND Timestamp >= prev_start_time AND Timestamp <= end_time

1459ede3-8584-4ce6-93c7-a6b713ee487c.title: Total Requests
1459ede3-8584-4ce6-93c7-a6b713ee487c.description: This defines total number of request within the time period selected

config.query:
WITH
    parseDateTimeBestEffort('{{filter.timeLimit.start}}') AS start_time,
    parseDateTimeBestEffort('{{filter.timeLimit.end}}') AS end_time,
    (end_time - start_time) AS duration,
    (start_time - duration) AS prev_start_time,
    (end_time - duration) AS prev_end_time

SELECT
    CAST(countIf(
        Timestamp >= start_time AND Timestamp <= end_time
    ) AS INTEGER) AS total_request,

    CAST(countIf(
        Timestamp >= prev_start_time AND Timestamp <= prev_end_time
    ) AS INTEGER) AS total_request_previous,

    round(
        if(countIf(Timestamp >= prev_start_time AND Timestamp <= prev_end_time) = 0, 
           (countIf(Timestamp >= start_time AND Timestamp <= end_time) * 100.0), 
           ((countIf(Timestamp >= start_time AND Timestamp <= end_time) - countIf(Timestamp >= prev_start_time AND Timestamp <= prev_end_time)) 
           / countIf(Timestamp >= prev_start_time AND Timestamp <= prev_end_time))*100.0
        ), 4
    ) AS rate

FROM otel_traces
WHERE
    SpanAttributes['gen_ai.operation.name'] == 'vectordb'
    AND StatusCode IN ('STATUS_CODE_OK', 'STATUS_CODE_UNSET', 'Ok', 'Unset')
    AND Timestamp >= prev_start_time AND Timestamp <= end_time;

cbfc156a-ded5-4fa9-868a-25a93baf1e36.title: Generation by application
cbfc156a-ded5-4fa9-868a-25a93baf1e36.description: This defines total number of request grouped by application name

config.query:
WITH
    parseDateTimeBestEffort('{{filter.timeLimit.start}}') AS start_time,
    parseDateTimeBestEffort('{{filter.timeLimit.end}}') AS end_time

SELECT 
    ResourceAttributes['service.name'] AS applicationName,
    CAST(COUNT(*) AS INTEGER) AS count
  FROM
  otel_traces
  WHERE 
  SpanAttributes['gen_ai.operation.name'] == 'vectordb'
  AND notEmpty(ResourceAttributes['service.name'])
  AND StatusCode IN ('STATUS_CODE_OK', 'STATUS_CODE_UNSET', 'Ok', 'Unset')
  AND Timestamp >= start_time
    AND Timestamp <= end_time
  GROUP BY applicationName;

2ef979cb-1380-4f40-8c8f-227f700c23c9.title: Generation by Operation
2ef979cb-1380-4f40-8c8f-227f700c23c9.description: This defines total number of request grouped by operation name

config.query:
WITH
    parseDateTimeBestEffort('{{filter.timeLimit.start}}') AS start_time,
    parseDateTimeBestEffort('{{filter.timeLimit.end}}') AS end_time

SELECT 
    SpanAttributes['db.operation.name'] AS operation,
    CAST(COUNT(*) AS INTEGER) AS count
  FROM
  otel_traces
  WHERE 
  SpanAttributes['gen_ai.operation.name'] == 'vectordb'
  AND notEmpty(SpanAttributes['db.operation.name'])
  AND StatusCode IN ('STATUS_CODE_OK', 'STATUS_CODE_UNSET', 'Ok', 'Unset')
  AND Timestamp >= start_time
    AND Timestamp <= end_time
  GROUP BY operation;
